long_description: No necklace required to dress up this comfortable T-shirt dress. The scoop neckline on the Aventura Sinclair Dress is adorned with an eye-catching decorative applique. Crafted from an earth-friendly blend of organic cotton and bamboo with a pleasing slub texture. Aventura Sinclair Dress features short sleeves with gathers on the shoulders. Classic fit is not too tight or too loose. Machine washable. Closeout.
short_description: No necklace required to dress up this comfortable T-shirt dress. The scoop neckline on the Aventura Sinclair Dress is adorned with an eye-catching decorative applique.
